thobe.widgets.splitPanel

Class SPDivider

  • java.lang.Object
    • thobe.widgets.splitPanel.SPDivider

  • public class SPDivider
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing the divider that separates two subframes of the SplitPanel from each other.
    Author:
    Thomas Obenaus
